description:
Enable CSV/JSON bulk data import with schema validation via Effect pipelines. Stream processing with progress updates via Server-Sent Events. Export filtered datasets with async job queue. Provide template downloads and error reporting with row-level details.

**Rationale:** Users migrating from other systems or performing batch operations expect bulk tooling. Manual one-by-one entry is friction. Progress visibility prevents abandonment during long-running operations.

title: Bulk import/export with progress tracking
